tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am currently visiting Dr Sravya for my routine pregnancy check up, *** ** **** ****** * **** ********* **** *** * *** ****** **** *** ***** *** *********** ********* I was prescribed by previous doctor which is one of the best thing one can do and always advice to take a natural source of protein, hemoglobin, iron etc... She explains everything in detail including scanning reports, blood reports, medicines she is prescribing etc... . I highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr sravya is very friendly and will listen all your queries with patience and explains the details of the problem, treatment options and the procedures very clearly in an understandable way to every one. I had visited for my infertility issue. I had previous miscarriage history, pcod and sub septate uterus where miscarriages are prone. Dr. Sravya explains the possible options and started treatment as per our choice, I conceived after 4 months of the treatment and detected to be high risk pregnancy at 5th week where I had series of blood clots till 8th week coz of SCH. I was literally ready for one more miscarriage news. I still can't forgot saying the same with Dr Shravya and she held my hand and said "You have to think positive for positive things to happen" and she gave me lot of courage, hope and strength with her words.. for people with infertility more than physical treatment counseling Is required the hope need to be rooted which is done perfectly by Dr. shravya. miraculously my baby is viable and at 13 weeks I was detected with placenta previa, Dr. Shravya guided me and monitored me through out my pregnancy with weekly checkups. slowly placenta moved little up as per folow up scans... she never gave unnecessary medicines or tests at anytime..  even when I ask for medicines for some of the pregnnacy side effects she strictly say no to medicines but try home rememdies. she promised to my family that she will try to safely deliver the baby along with mother..At 38 weeks I had delivered a healthy baby boy through c sec.. but it was detected at the time of surgery that placenta is still attached to uterus.. and had to do complicated surgery which was fatal in some cases...  Dr Shravyana was also in the surgery room.. with in mins of starting the surgery I heard my baby cry which is the best moment in my entire life.. the next moment I saw complete tension mode in face of both the doctors I can see them discussing vigorously I understood something is wrong.. the next moment I know I am vomiting,my epidural anesthesia is almost wearing off im feeling the pain and movements in abdomen... both the doctors and anesthesiologist everyone is trying to make me cool.. I tried to calm myself by thinking about my new born.. but nothing worked finally Dr had to put me in local anesthesia and i remember waking up with pain.. but with releif anf happy faces of both the Dr's, nurses and my family surrounding by me. it's second life for myself. forever grateful to Dr Shravya and Dr shravanya for saving my life and bringing my cute little pie to the world as promised. I highly recommend Dr Shravya and Dr Shravanya to everyone.. especially for critical cases like me... clinic may be small in kukatpally but rest assured with the talents of Dr Shravya and Dr Shravanya you and your baby are in safe hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am an IT Tech employee from Gachibowli . I came across Dr Sravya on Practo and was on follow up with her since March 2022  . Initially I wanted my delivery to be done at my home town Warangal ,as my parents live there. During my follow up at Poornima hospital, i spoke to a couple of patients who underwent delivery at Poornima hospital. They were happy and  for a lady with High BP during delivery , she told me that the doctor checked on her hourly and deliveries went smooth .

 I discussed with my parents and convinced them that i want my delivery to be done in Hyderabad. Initially reluctant,later we arrived at Poornima hospital. My amniotic fluid was less with baby inverted ( Breech is the term Doctors use) . So i had to undergo Ceserean section , i remember entering Operation theatre and from then when i woke up , i remember Dr Sravya handing over the baby to me with a broad smile ,such a nice memory . I had pain for 12 hours following surgery , which gradually decreased and was discharged after 2 days .

 I worked with Team leader/ HR who show infinity level attitude despite not knowing ,then there is Dr Sravya filled with knowledge and no attitude .Hence i recommend her 10/10 for any gynacological procedure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: It's my first pregnancy and going good. Doctor interaction is very good. Mostly she suggests healthy routines.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy Scan,Maternal Fetal Medicine,Pregnant Women Counseling,Child Birth Education,
review:
Greate Thanks to Dr. Sravya. 

Your compassionate bedside manner and unwavering dedication to your patients is truly remarkable.  You have a gift for putting people at ease and your positivity and encouragement have been a guiding light during my journey. We would like to express our sincere gratitude for your outstanding care and expertise throughout my delivery.  Your experience, knowledge, and kindness were greatly appreciated and we are so grateful for your support. Your dedication and attention to detail was greatly appreciated and we are so thankful for your guidance and compassion. Thank you for everything you have done.

Special Thanks to the Nurses  and the Staff for their utmost care and support.

‚ÄúWords can't express the love and appreciation I have in my heart for all of you!
Thanks for nurturing the baby and me through this pregnancy!‚Äù

review:
I feel vary happy  

Treatment of doctor

 I feel very good with the doctor comunication treatment and explanation before I meet with the doctor I feel very ocward and very tense but after meeting by the doctor comunication treatment now I feel good and better and now my health is very much better after meeting by doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sravya help me in removal 9.5 CM fibroid from my uterus through laproscopy hysterectomy . I was in Dubai for the past 1 year and on follow up with Dr Reshma Devjani in Dubai ,she explained everything in detail that i require surgery,however i could not afford the treatment there . So when i visited Hyderabad i was reluctant to approach any doctor , as i was afraid they would be arrogant. On advice of family friend ,i visited Dr Sravya . She completely changed my opinion about Doctor ,she is such a cool personality in answering any silling questions ,at the same time she maintains 100 percent clarity on the next step . I liked her approach and underwent uterus removal at Poornima hospital. I was following her up for next 2 weeks . She has inspired me at both professional level and personal level . A huge shout out to you Madam .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr Sravya  when i was 4 months pregnant. *** *** **** * ************** friendly and smart .I had an insurance which would be covered at Rainbow hospital ,Banjara hills . But i wanted surgery to be done only by Dr Sravya ,as i felt much more comfortable with her. So i requested her , to come there and do my delivery. Guess what she made sure she had the instruments required for surgery before hand and also spoke to the staff assisting surgery .The surgery and follow up went on well ,pain reduced after a day and she discharged me on my 3rd day . I feel indebted to her ,as she is really such a sweet ,humble and knowledgeable soul . May God shower blessings on her and her family.

tags: None
review:
Recently my sister had a complication and was told that baby was upside down .I went along with my sister to multiple hospitals in Hyderabad. Few hospitals told the risk was high,few had very high prices. I thought of visiting Poornima hospital before as I was delivered there. Finally we met Sravya madam at that hospital. 
Madam explained each and everything with patience and advised very limited blood tests .my sister delivered there Normal delivery (Not cesarean operation as every other doctor told).She did not have any complication .Thanq  Madam and Staff Poornima hospital . We highly recommend her

review:
Our first visit to the doctor who was just a trial visit, as we were not satisfied with the prior doctor . but after first consultation, we decided that we want Madam to be our treating doctor . 
She explained our lab reports in layman terms and guided as throughout the delivery journey. importantly she never gives medicines unless otherwise required. Her team answers us round the clock . So i surely recommend Madam

tags: None

Have known Ramakrishna sir of Poornima nursing home since 25 years .
So with that trust I visited Dr Sravya for Abnormal uterine bleeding , the way she did Biopsy and counselled us were very good . She also thinks in terms of our affordability . Will recommend her for any obstetric or gynaecology problem .

tags: None
review: I have been showing my aunty to Sravya Madam since 2018 .Madam is so friendly and she answers every question with patience . She underwent Uterus removal in September 2021 and is so happy with her treatment.  I don't  know about other ladies specialists , but for me and my family; we totally trust Madam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is very friendly. She explained everything about health and issues. given best medicine for health issues

tags: None
review: I made this appointment for my mother, she only had positive thinking to say about doctor. Doctor took her time to understand problem and provided detailed explanation to my mother. Would definitely recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr sravya is very friendly and will listen all your queries with patience and explains the details of the problem, treatment options and the procedures very clearly in an understandable way to every one. I had visited for my infertility issue. I had pcod. Dr. Sravya explains the possible options and started treatment as per our choice, I still can't forget that she's saying she held my hand and said "You have to think positive for positive things to happen" and her words become true. I got my pregnant after following her guidelines and she gave me lot of courage, hope, and strength with her words.  She never gave unnecessary medicines or tests at anytime.. Even when I ask for medicines for the pregnancy, due to side effects, she strictly said no to medicines, but she said try home remedies.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr Shravya after i had severe pain in my stomach for 2 days. after doing an ultrasound scan madam confirmed that I had a large ovarian cyst and it could be rotated (Torsion in medicine term) . She recommended painkillers diet and exercise management . She also told we need to go ahead with surgery if required . However since my symptoms were persisting and with the size of the cyst increasing , she discussed surgery will be the best option . I was very nervous before the surgery and took my entire family to her. We shot about 40 to 50 questions to her , she was so patient and explained everything in an elobarate manner ,  instantaneously my family was satisfied and we went ahead with the surgery . Now my surgery scars are healing and i have no pain . She is definitely a go to person for any medical problem for me .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I think no where in Hyderabad i would have got a normal delivery. My sister wanted a normal delivery, we pardoned but she landed up in Cesarean section. My Aunt's daughter (Samyuktha ) recommended Dr Sravya in Poornima hospital ,as she got normal delivery done there and she was satisfied. So i went to Poornima hospital and it was a good experience. I had a baby girl by normal delivery after trying for 10 hours . Madam was so patient,in these 10 hours , i was crying continuously, she consoled me telling "the bad part is over , be a little patient and in no time ill give your baby " . She did as she told ,im extremely satisfied with her

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I am from Kolkata, I call her Sravya didi . I have visited her for Hysterectomy ( removal of uterus) which was plaguing me from past 5 years . Due to blood loss i felt weak . I tried all kinds of medication across Kolkata and Hyderabad,but in vain . I met Didi this year beginning,she is a kind of person who heals with heart . I dont know why ,but when she told that i need surgery, I felt she was the one who can solve my problem . So she did hysterectomy, 10 months it has been , my Hemoglobin increased , I feel a lot active. I also speak about my personal issues , she is a kind hearted gem . When in Hyderabad,i always recommend Didi

tags: None
review: Visited for stomach pain . I have been having stomach pain and menstruation cycle problem from 2 years and visited multiple hospitals. They just used to give multiple drugs and send me . On 25th March ,i visited Doc . She did stomach scan and told told that i had a condition " Endometriosis" . I had been given medications and the doc told me various excersices and food which was to be taken daily . Next month also pain continued ,but as of May 22, I lost 9 kgs and continued medicines.Now i do not have pain / cycle problems. I want to appreciate her for motivating me

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
doctor sravya has been my family doctor since 2 yrs , i visited her recently for copper device (mirena ), though it is a 2 minutes procedure ,it was painless procedure. recommend h my first pregnancy was ectopic so i was hesitant whether to conceive the second time. so i went to sravya madam after my friend told me to consult . then i met my angel sravya madam . after discussing,i conceived,my entire pregnancy i was feeling  positive .then my baby delivery at 8 months . i hurriedly went to poornima hospital in evening ,my entire delivery was done in a span of 40 mins . now my son is healthy and fine . i feel indebted to her . thanks is a small word , but im telling it heartfully

had infection and white colour discharge,so visited mada. she gave antibiotics and told me about how it came and how it can be prevented.in 3 days ,infection and itching came down .i could communicate about these issues with her as she is my age . recommend visiting her for our age group
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words . We will definitely strive to give our best

review: I strongly recommend her.We liked her positive approach first.We are from Tamilnadu and we don't know telugu.She explained everything in English like teacher to Kid.Above all,Her medicines gaves some energy and confident to my wife.Now my wife feels so good and healthy in First trimester pregnancy..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Its rare to find a doctor with personal touch and professional ethics. Doctor Sravya is that rare combination. I got delivered at Sridevi nursing home , Secunderabad where her grandfather used to practice and my son was delivered at Poornima nursing home , Ameerpet. Me ,my mother and husband like her personally and professionallypramila

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is very friendly in listening to us. we had pregnancy issues from the past 9 months. After visiting her the next two months I was carrying a  baby. There is a thing called Hasthavaasi in telugu, means with good and positive touch ,things will be done. I feel she has that touch

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Treatment was overall good . The hospital near to Maithrivanam, near access to Ameerpet Metro . Staff were polite . The Doc was patient to explain me the pros and cons of procedure being performed ,she was knowledgeable and simplified things for my understanding. I got Cuerratge procedure done and was sent home the same day . Overall she was good ,no regrets in visiting Poornima hospital

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I started following up with Sravyaji since 8 months /pregnancy . On 7th May , i came to hospital with pains , Dr Sravya and nurse there ,waited for 12 hours to push . i had lots of pain and was exhausted by 11 pm , I told many times i could not push ,she gave me hope . Finally , i was tired and told i can't do it anymore .Then she did Ceserin operation on me and finally gave me my Tara . I thank Sravyaji , who transformed a lady into Mother

tags: None
review: Visited for pregnancy checkup for twins, She never gets irritated , i used to message randomly at night.She used to reply at early morning. She wrote limited tests and used to show both my babies on scan machine . Less waiting period and more friendly. Only issue was it is located away from my home

tags: None
review: My wife has pain in stomach and  increased bleeding in her periods since 15 years ,for which we have consulted numerous doctors . Finally we consulted  Madam at Poornima nursing home , she did examination and diagnosed with Asherman syndrome and started her on treatment.Now my wife feels a lot better.Highly recommend Madam
